bug.author: beinando
bug.summary: Hypergan trains on CPU even CUDA is installed
bug.description: Hello, i just got to run Hypergan after some hours, but somehow it uses the CPU instead of the GPU. I don't know why,i followed all steps as described. I tried python hypergan train C:\testImages -s 32x32x3 -f png -c mymodel --resize CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES= hypergan --device '/cpu:0' so i simply added the CUDA... command at the end of the command, but it caused an error. Where do i need to write this CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES commend? Thank you Here's the console output: (base) C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\Scripts>python hypergan train C:\testImages -s 32x32x3 -f png -c mymodel --resize [loader] ImageLoader found 2048 images with 0 different class labels WARNING: Logging before flag parsing goes to stderr. W0711 22:25:29.986361 1196 deprecation.py:323] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\hypergan\inputs\image_loader.py:52: slice_input_producer (from tensorflow.python.training.input) is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Instructions for updating: Queue-based input pipelines have been replaced by tf.data. Use tf.data.Dataset.from_tensor_slices(tuple(tensor_list)).shuffle(tf.shape(input_tensor, out_type=tf.int64)[0]).repeat(num_epochs). If shuffle=False, omit the .shuffle(...). W0711 22:25:29.991363 1196 deprecation.py:323] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\python\training\input.py:374: range_input_producer (from tensorflow.python.training.input) is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Instructions for updating: Queue-based input pipelines have been replaced by tf.data. Use tf.data.Dataset.range(limit).shuffle(limit).repeat(num_epochs). If shuffle=False, omit the .shuffle(...). W0711 22:25:29.994367 1196 deprecation.py:323] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\python\training\input.py:320: input_producer (from tensorflow.python.training.input) is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Instructions for updating: Queue-based input pipelines have been replaced by tf.data. Use tf.data.Dataset.from_tensor_slices(input_tensor).shuffle(tf.shape(input_tensor, out_type=tf.int64)[0]).repeat(num_epochs). If shuffle=False, omit the .shuffle(...). W0711 22:25:29.995367 1196 deprecation.py:323] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\python\training\input.py:190: limit_epochs (from tensorflow.python.training.input) is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Instructions for updating: Queue-based input pipelines have been replaced by tf.data. Use tf.data.Dataset.from_tensors(tensor).repeat(num_epochs). W0711 22:25:29.997362 1196 deprecation.py:323] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\python\training\input.py:199: QueueRunner.init (from tensorflow.python.training.queue_runner_impl) is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Instructions for updating: To construct input pipelines, use the tf.data module. W0711 22:25:29.999453 1196 deprecation.py:323] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\tensorflow\python\training\input.py:199: add_queue_runner (from tensorflow.python.training.queue_runner_impl) is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Instructions for updating: To construct input pipelines, use the tf.data module. W0711 22:25:30.006362 1196 deprecation_wrapper.py:119] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\hypergan\inputs\image_loader.py:55: The name tf.read_file is deprecated. Please use tf.io.read_file instead. W0711 22:25:30.008363 1196 deprecation_wrapper.py:119] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\hypergan\inputs\image_loader.py:72: The name tf.image.resize_images is deprecated. Please use tf.image.resize instead. W0711 22:25:30.014367 1196 deprecation.py:323] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\hypergan\inputs\image_loader.py:101: shuffle_batch (from tensorflow.python.training.input) is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Instructions for updating: Queue-based input pipelines have been replaced by tf.data. Use tf.data.Dataset.shuffle(min_after_dequeue).batch(batch_size). W0711 22:25:30.032362 1196 deprecation_wrapper.py:119] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\hypergan\ops\tensorflow\ops.py:277: The name tf.ConfigProto is deprecated. Please use tf.compat.v1.ConfigProto instead. W0711 22:25:30.032362 1196 deprecation_wrapper.py:119] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\hypergan\ops\tensorflow\ops.py:282: The name tf.Session is deprecated. Please use tf.compat.v1.Session instead. W0711 22:25:30.041363 1196 deprecation_wrapper.py:119] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\hypergan\encoders\uniform_encoder.py:26: The name tf.random_uniform is deprecated. Please use tf.random.uniform instead. W0711 22:25:30.048367 1196 deprecation_wrapper.py:119] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\hypergan\ops\tensorflow\ops.py:140: The name tf.variable_scope is deprecated. Please use tf.compat.v1.variable_scope instead. W0711 22:25:30.062362 1196 deprecation.py:506] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\hypergan\ops\tensorflow\ops.py:96: calling Constant.init (from tensorflow.python.ops.init_ops) with dtype is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Instructions for updating: Call initializer instance with the dtype argument instead of passing it to the constructor [generator] Initial depth [32, 4, 4, 192] W0711 22:25:30.073363 1196 deprecation.py:323] From C:\Users\Megaport\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\hypergan\ops\tensorflow\activations.py:29: add_dispatch_support..wrapper (from tensorflow.python.ops.array_ops) is deprecated and will be removed in a future version. Instructions for updating: Use tf.where in 2.0, which has the same broadcast rule as np.where [generator] layer Tensor("2/BiasAdd:0", shape=(32, 8, 8, 128), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) 8192 [generator] layer Tensor("3/BiasAdd:0", shape=(32, 16, 16, 64), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) 16384 [discriminator] layer Tensor("discriminator_1/BiasAdd:0", shape=(64, 16, 16, 64), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [hypergan] adding layer filter Tensor("mul_7:0", shape=(64, 16, 16, 64), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [discriminator] layer Tensor("discriminator_2/BiasAdd:0", shape=(64, 8, 8, 128), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [discriminator] layer Tensor("discriminator_2/BiasAdd:0", shape=(64, 8, 8, 128), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [hypergan] adding layer filter Tensor("mul_9:0", shape=(64, 8, 8, 128), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [discriminator] layer Tensor("discriminator_3/BiasAdd:0", shape=(64, 4, 4, 192), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [discriminator] layer Tensor("discriminator_3/BiasAdd:0", shape=(64, 4, 4, 192), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [hypergan] adding layer filter Tensor("mul_11:0", shape=(64, 4, 4, 192), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [discriminator] layer Tensor("discriminator_4/BiasAdd:0", shape=(64, 2, 2, 256), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [discriminator] layer Tensor("discriminator_4/BiasAdd:0", shape=(64, 2, 2, 256), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [hypergan] adding layer filter Tensor("mul_13:0", shape=(64, 2, 2, 256), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [discriminator] layer Tensor("discriminator_5/BiasAdd:0", shape=(64, 1, 1, 320), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [discriminator] layer Tensor("discriminator_5/BiasAdd:0", shape=(64, 1, 1, 320), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) [discriminator] output Tensor("Tanh_1:0", shape=(64, 300), dtype=float32, device=/device:GPU:0) comments.comment: Have you sloved this issues? i had met same problem if you have sloved, could you give me some tips about this issue thanks! <denchmark-link:https://github.com/beinando>@beinando</denchmark-link>
